meanings: (쓰레기 등을) throw away, throw out, dump, (informal) junk
(포기하다, 떠나다) desert, leave, abandon, (literary) forsake, give up

examples.korean: Have you forgotten about that money I lent you last week? 발음듣기 너 내가 지난주에 네게 빌려준 그 돈에 대해 잊어버린 거니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Have you forgotten about that money I lent you last week? 발음

examples.korean: Let bygones be bygones. 발음듣기 지나가 버린 건 잊어버려. DARAKWON
Where has all the time gone? 발음듣기 그 좋던 시절이 언제 이렇게 다 가버린거지? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Where has all the time gone? 발음

examples.korean: She never completely gave up hope. 발음듣기 아직 완전히 희망을 버린 건 아니야. Neungyule
examples.english: She never completely gave up hope. 발음

examples.korean: I'm not very well organized and I'd be forever driving to town to get something I'd forgotten. 발음듣기 난 꼼꼼하지 못해서 잊어버린 거 사러 매번 시내까지 가야 할 거예요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I'm not very well organized and I'd be forever driving to town to get something I'd forgotten. 발음
